2010 NBA Playoffs Summary

2009 Playoffs Summary 2011 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Los Angeles Lakers

Finals MVP: Kobe Bryant (28.6 / 8.0 / 3.9)


2010 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Kobe Bryant (671)

TRB: Pau Gasol (255)

AST: Rajon Rondo (223)

WS: Pau Gasol (4.3)
